description.narrative: Strengthened administrative data, improved child-sensitive judicial procedures, quality legal aid and capacities of justice and law- enforcement professionals ensure that boys and girls in contact with the justice system receive fair, timely and effective services and remedies when their rights are violated.

mailing-address.narrative: 87 A. Doundukov Blvd. Fl.2 Sofia 1504 Bulgaria P.O. Box 801

sector.narrative: Access to child-friendly police and justice sector services
Promoting diversion and alternatives to deprivation of liberty

related-activity.ref: 0570/A0/05/003 PREVENTION OF VIOLENCE AND ACCESS TO JUSTICE

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Strengthened administrative data, improved child-sensitive judicial procedures, quality legal aid and capacities of justice and law- enforcement professionals ensure that boys and girls in contact with the justice system receive fair, timely and effective services and remedies when their rights are violated.

description.narrative: Legal amendments strengthening the guarantees for protection of unaccompanied migrant children; Regularization of the situation of unaccompanied children who have not applied for or received international protection; Decrease of time of unlawful detention of unaccompanied migrant children; Draft Educational Measures Act finalized; Consistent drop in the number of children deprived of liberty in correctional-educational facilities. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:19/12/2019

title.narrative: Number of children placed in correctional boarding schools
Number of unaccompanied migrant and asylum seeking children in detention
Existence of procedures and services for children in contact with law that are applied and delivered in line with international norms

baseline.value: Some services and procedures exist but they are not fully developed, applied and delivered in line with international norms

target.value: 2022:Procedures for diversion in compliance with international norms are implemented
